Talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive>Hey, traveler. I'd stay away from that stuff
if you care about your health.

Folks are calling it <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>. If you get any
on you, you'll start <clr:0000>losing your strength<clr:ffff>,
like it's sapping your life away.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01>I touched some gloom while poking
around in the Depths, and now look
at me.
The worst of it will <clr:0000>recover<clr:ffff> on its own,
little by little, so long as you're on
the <clr:0000>surface<clr:ffff>.
But while you're in the Depths, you won't
recover at all.<sp:5:0:0> I thought I was going to die
down there.
*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>Some investigation leader I turned
out to be. <sp:5:0:0>This is just pitiful.
Talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I don't like seeing Daval working all
alone in the rain...
Talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I'm completely reliant on Daval, so I
really want to recover by noon...
Talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I'm completely reliant on Daval, so I
really want to recover by nighttime...
Talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive>Traveler? <sp:5:0:0>Are you feeling OK?


Folks are calling this stuff <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>If you
care about your health, it's best not to
go near it.
If you get any on you, you'll start <clr:0000>losing
your strength<clr:ffff>, like it's sapping your
life away.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01>I touched some gloom while poking
around in the Depths, and now look
at me.
You'll <clr:0000>recover<clr:ffff> from the worst of it on your
own, little by little, so long as you're on
the <clr:0000>surface<clr:ffff>.
But while you're in the Depths, you won't
recover at all.<sp:5:0:0> I thought I was going to die
down there.
*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>Some investigation leader I turned
out to be. <sp:5:0:0>This is just pitiful.
Talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I'm completely reliant on Daval, so I
really want to recover by morning...
Talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>It'll sap your strength, <sp:5:0:0>and you'll end up
like me...<sp:5:1:0>too sluggish to move...
Talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive>Traveler, please be extra cautious around
the <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>.

I've been recovering slowly—very slowly—
since coming back to the surface.

But while I was in the Depths, I couldn't
recover at all.<sp:5:0:0> Who knows what would've
become of me...
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I'm taking care of myself and resting, but<sp:5:0:0>
I can't imagine an encounter with the
gloom a second time, no sir.
Talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseL>N-no!<sp:5:0:0> Traveler, don't do it!<sp:5:0:0> If you touch
that, well...
Talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>If you touch <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>, it'll sap your strength
and you'll end up like me—<sp:5:0:0>too sluggish
to move!
Talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>There's no way I can make Daval work
alone in the rain.

I need to recover. Pronto.
